name: Drag and Bounce
description:
Created for Trijam 115 in 3 hours - the theme was "Drag and Drop".

Bring the ball to the goal via Drag and Drop. Some throwing might be required.

The ball drops when you hit a wall. You can't drag within the red zone.

Game didn't click for me so I stopped working on the gameplay after less then 2 hours... Came back for some polishing and added a few levels. Hope you enjoy it.

Assets used:

Humble Bundle: Casual Game Music Pack Song 1

Ball and Stick Assets by: https://kenney.nl/

Bounce Sound: Humble Bundle Ultimate Game SFX - Thump Sound
